name: Operations Agent
description: An A2A agent specializing in operational planning, resource optimization, process automation, and performance monitoring.

skills.name: Resource Optimization
skills.description: Analyzes operational data and provides recommendations for optimal allocation of resources (e.g., manpower, machinery, or time).

examples.input: Optimize staffing levels for a 24/7 warehouse operation with fluctuating demand.
examples.output: Recommend increasing night shift staff by 20% and reducing weekend staff by 10% to match order volume trends.

skills.name: Process Improvement
skills.description: Evaluates current operational processes and suggests improvements to increase efficiency or reduce costs.

examples.input: Evaluate the order fulfillment process for inefficiencies.
examples.output: Identified bottleneck at packing stage; suggest adding a parallel station and using barcode scanners for faster verification.

skills.name: KPI Monitoring
skills.description: Monitors operational KPIs and flags anomalies or performance dips in real time.

examples.input: Track weekly fulfillment rate and flag if it drops below 95%.
examples.output: Alert: Fulfillment rate dropped to 92% in week 28 due to delayed supplier shipments.
